lines.text: there's a town in Arizona called Mohawk! Maybe I'll retire there!
[first lines]
I'm so sick of doing this; I'm sick of waiting for the world to end.
Me, too. Why don't we do something else for a change?
Yeah? Like what?
Well, if we put our heads together, maybe we could figure something out.
My head just got stepped on. I can't think of nothing.
California! Let's move to California!
I got a job. I got responsibilities.
Biscut, you're washing dishes in a shithole, brother. Personally, I think you could risk the career change.
Nice country, man. It's kinda like a Road Runner cartoon - meep-meep...! I mean, it's kinda creepy, like there's too much open space. Do you feel that?
So, what's y'all fellas' line of work?
Survival.
Oh, well that's the slowest form of suicide.
[hands Grant his business card]
Well, look, man, if I can ever be of any help...

[reading]
Dared-delvis...? Horse trader, snake charmer, marriage counselor, divorce lawyer, musician, poker player, stunt driver, dowser, clairvoyant, actor, poet.
Yeah, man, but my real bread and butter's the Bullfightin' scene. You really oughta' catch my act sometime - it's going nowhere but up!
Till a week ago, I ain't never seen a dead man before, and now - fuck - you know?
Aw, man! We just got a little carried away that night, that's all! That buddy of yours; that was the first white man we ever killed, honest!
Look, Milo, we're talking about real life here, okay? Real life is not California. Real life is a shit sandwich and every day you gotta take another bite.
